reporting-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT FOR BUSINESS, ENERGY AND INDUSTRIAL STRATEGY

description.narrative: (1) focus policy attention on issues of strategic technological importance for both countries; (2) building policy consensus and foundation for in-depth cooperation; (3) sharing lessons and insight on tools and methods for strategy and practice within a particular industrial sector/ key engineering theme; (4) reach policy positions to advocate for legistlative change

Newton Research Collaboration Programme facilitates exchanges between UK researchers and counterparts in Partner Countries. Exchanges form part of a collaborative engineering research project, incorporating visits and dissemination activities. The exchange constitutes an internationally excellent collaboration which benefits social welfare and economic development, and enhances research skills in the partner country.
